title: 5v5 Ranked lf Top/Jng/Mid
body:
Hello there guys,
iam in work to create a serious team,
Requirements and what we can offer:

-The team will pretty much play Everyday in the evenings so pls be rly active.
-Playtime is between 19 and 20 oCLock CET.
-Iam looking for Toplane, Jungler and a Midlane.
-We will use Skype/TS for communication.
-be atleast 18years old
-Wish to be part of something more then just a grp of people who just play the same Game
-Play atleast 3hours aDay
-Dont be in BronzeElo
-Pls rly main the role u apply for 
-I will play some Normals with u to see how u behave in different situatuions and get used to your championpool.



if ur interrested pls apply here and/or addme ingame for a chat.

Strawhatya

replies.body:
Hey im from Germany and very interested in your post.
I am a Main Jungler, who prefer to play champs like Rengar, Lee Sin, Maokai, Vi, Pantheon and sure Twisted Fate :D
But im also mid pretty good because of my Zed and kata are so amazing.
Im good with Annie, Lissandra, Ahri, Viktor good
Just give me an answer under this comment please
